title: I cannot buy Camille with IP even though I have more than enough IP for her
body: Hey, I would like a response from Riot regarding an issue with buying Camille in the new beta client. I have 7999 IP ( i saved this specifically for Camille) and it will not let me buy Camille. It says I do not have enough IP. Please fix this issue, I am not pleased with this. I have been trying to buy her since yesterday and I still cannot buy her. Thanks.

replies.body: Looking into this, your IP is showing just a bit shy of that.  You may need to relog in case it's out of sync, but I refreshed it as well so it should show the accurate amount.  Good luck!
I have relogged many times actually. Like I said, this is a recurring issue. And as of right now, I have 8089 IP.
Awesome!  It looks like it's refreshed for me as well to show the same amount.  Are you able to unlock her now?
It is allowing me to buy her now. Thank you for the help :P
